entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
